title: Is it possible for a new channel to get 1,000 subscribers in one day on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is not possible. Because youtube follows some ethical rules and if any person is caught by doing some unethical things, his/her channel cannot be monetized. Also don't try to like for like.Sub for sub.Comment for commentThese above mentioned things may lead to permanent deletion of your channel. Thank you. Regards.

Yes it is possible , I think a way is that if are lucky and you connect with any big youtuber and you donate him heavy amount if he will accept that you will get 1,000 subscriber in a day. Otherwise it is impossible to get 1k in a day on youtube.
